title: Open beta
description: Use Tableland on testnet and mainnet chains while the protocol is in development.

frontMatter.title: Open beta
frontMatter.description: Use Tableland on testnet and mainnet chains while the protocol is in development.
frontMatter.synopsis: The Tableland network is actively being developed and plans to launch a production (mainnet) in 2024. Prior to that launch, the protocol can still be used on supported chains, but its important to note what's in store in the future.
